pr_title: Fix FTP Filetype and Upload bug

timeline.message:
Remove local file exists check when creating OutputStreams for S/FTP
Set FTP FileType to Binary instead of default ASCII

Fixes: SIRI-194

timeline.bodyText: could you check all other Uplinks as well - just to be sure...
timeline.author: andyHa
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -135,7 +135,6 @@ private MutableVirtualFile wrap(VirtualFile parent, SftpClient.DirEntry file, St
               .withDeleteHandler(this::deleteHandler)
               .withCanProvideInputStream(this::isExistingFile)
               .withInputStreamSupplier(this::inputStreamSupplier)
-              .withCanProvideOutputStream(this::isExistingFile)

replies.bodyText: Found one more, please check if this has to be removed.
replies.author: mkeckmkeck

timeline.message:
Remove isExistingFile predicate on for outputstream creation on LocalDirectoryUplink as well

Fixes: SIRI-194
